'''Shortcut Wheel''' in an interface that allows the player to quickly access other areas without needing to open the [[Paimon Menu]]. The default keybinds are {{key|Tab}} on PC and {{key|ps-l1}}/{{key|xb-lb}} on controller.

The default entries for the 8-Direction Wheel are:
# [[Wish]]
# [[Adventurer Handbook]]
# [[Inventory]]
# [[Character]]
# [[Map]]
# [[Quests]]
# [[Events]]
# [[Battle Pass]]

The default entries for the 4-Direction Wheel are:
# Wish
# Inventory
# Map
# Events

==Customization==
The Shortcut Wheel can be customized from the [[Settings]]. The wheel can be set as an 8-Direction Wheel or 4-Direction Wheel.

The available entries are:
{{Column|2|
* [[Shop]]
* [[Party|Party Setup]]
* [[Friends]]
* [[Archive]]
* [[Character Archive]]
* [[Character]]
* [[Inventory]]
* [[Quests]]
* [[Map]]
* [[Events]]
* [[Adventurer Handbook]]
* [[Wish]]
* [[Battle Pass]]
* [[Co-Op Mode]]
* [[Photo Mode|Take Photo]]
* [[Mail]]
* [[Time]]
* [[Settings]]
}}
